review: The physical device is amazing. We absolutely love the processor speed, RAM (memory) capacity, HD picture, and overall 'look-and-feel' of the device and remote, as well as features like the 'instant next' which loads the next episode while your still watching the current one.At first purchase, the software was... wonky. I would get occasional errors related to OS work which required restarts, and some apps would 'loose' login data, and needed to be closed (or forced to stop), which is complicated and not intuitive to find out how to do (it's in app settings).I really like the FireTV app for Droid/OSX that can completely replace the remote(!) and has added features like voice search, for no extra fee Or hardware.It would be better if it were more popular, and more networks would license their content to FireTV. It would be easier to use if every app was requires by Amazon to use the same keyboard layout (some are qwerty, some are abcde, some are, 5x6 squares, some are 1x26 in a line).I'm only withholding the 5th star due to the somewhat 'klunky' interface and desire for more content.
